name: 9.5 "Ma Always Liked You Best" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who called the gang at Cheers lazy?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	There was a lot of jack-hammering going on and they all wondered what was going on. However, they were all too lazy to go and look.

questions.text: What happened when Frasier went to find out what was happening outside?
questions.explanation:
He fell through a hole.

	That was another why no one went outside to check what was going on. There was a big hole at the top of the steps. Frasier was okay however, more embarrassed than anything.

Cliff's.

	Esther "Ma" Clavin was played by Frances Sternhagen. She was born January 13, 1930. She was in the movie "Sibling Rivalry" with Kirstie Alley.

questions.text: Who got a raise at his job?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Norm said that if you paid a man more money they worked faster. When Cliff said he got a raise Norm replied, "The exception that proves the rule."

questions.text: How many hours did the mother say she was in labor with her child?
questions.explanation:
72.

	The average labor lasts between 8 and 18 hours. She was trying to make Cliff feel guilty for taking so long.

questions.text: What movie were the mother and Woody watching?
questions.explanation:
Police Academy.

	Since Cliff didn't have interest in seeing his mom, Woody invited her to stay with him. He even started to call her "Ma Clavin".

questions.text: What bird did Woody say was a depressed bird?
questions.explanation:
lark.

	He said the lark had the highest suicide rate among birds. Cliff was a little jealous (although he wouldn't admit it) that Ma Clavin was teaching Woody bird trivia.

questions.text: Who got stuck in the window?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	They were trying to make another entrance to Cheers due to the fact the regular entrance had a big hole from the construction. Norm said they took enough bars out that even he could fit through, and when he showed them he got stuck.

questions.text: Who fought over Esther with Cliff?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Esther said that Woody was "the son I never had." She then said Cliff was "the son I did have". She stated she had plenty of love for both of them.

questions.text: Who tried to bribe the officers?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Rebecca didn't realize there was a big difference between bribing a construction worker to work harder and a police officer. They were taking her out when she told Sam to grab her purse.
